text: 2:7 Efesus 2:20-22; 3:17; Kolosi 1:23Egh ia a gisɨn tuivigh gavgavigh, mati temem biba sara nguazimɨn tugha gavgafi. Uaghan mati dɨpenim dɨpenir akɨnir gavgavibagh isɨn tughav iti. Ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Akar Aghuir Epafras ian sure gamizir kamɨn iti, egh kamaghɨn ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim aghung mangɨvɨra ikɨ. Egh zurara God mɨnabɨvɨra ikɨ.
